articles.title: Refugee status for white South Africans: First group flying to US - BBC
articles.description: Donald Trump says they are victims of "racial discrimination", which is strongly denied by South Africa.
articles.content:
The first set of 49 white South Africans to be granted refugee status by President Donald Trump's administration are on their way to the US.
On Sunday they boarded a flight from Johannesburg which i… [+2361 chars]
